parameterdescription.para: The type representing the volume load function.
The type representing the Neumann boundary load function.
The global basis for the finite element.
The local element to bind.
Young's modulus of the material.
Poisson's ratio of the material.
Thickness of the shell.

briefdescription.para: Get the global flat indices for the power basis.

detaileddescription.para: The global indices are collected in a FlatInterLeaved order. I.e. x_0, y_0, z_0, ..., x_n, y_n, z_n

parameterdescription.para: Output vector to store global indices.
